name: RX_COMPOUND_COST_BASIS
description: This table stores the code indicating the method by which the drug cost of an ingredient used in a compound was calculated for the prescription.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim value record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: CMP_INGRED_COST_DET_BASIS
columns.description: The code indicating the method by which the drug cost of an ingredient used in a compound was calculated.
